item.title: John Denver - Annie's Song
item.description:
You fill up my senses
like a night
in a forget
Like the mountains
in spring time
like a walk in the rain
Like a storm in the
desert like a sleepy
blue ocean
You fill up my senses
come fill me again
Come let me
love you let me
give my life to you
Let me drown
in your laughter
let me die
in your arms
Let me lay down
beside you
let me always
be with you
Come let me love you
come love me again-

Like a sleepy
blue ocean
You fill up
my senses come
fill me again
Come let me senses
like a night
in a forest
Like the mountains
in spring time
like a walk
in the rain
Like a storm
in the desert
like a sleepy
blue ocean
You fill up my senses
come fill me again-
